data.actual_result: You can bypass the return limit by pasting that text that has returns in it.
data.expected_result: It should not let you bypass the return limit.
data.short_description: You can Bypass a notes return limit by copying and pasting text that contain a return.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a users profile. - Copy and paste text that has multiple returns above it. - Exit the note. - Go back, and it saves it.
